scripts.prepare:setup: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist/docs dist/lib build/docs/markdown build/docs/wiki build/sdk/javascript/src
scripts.validate: firebolt-openrpc --task validate --source ./src --shared-schemas node_modules/@firebolt-js/schemas/src/schemas/ && npm run build:openrpc && firebolt-openrpc --task validate --source ./dist/firebolt-open-rpc.json --shared-schemas node_modules/@firebolt-js/schemas/src/schemas/
scripts.dist:sdk: npm run validate && npm run build:sdk && cp -R ./build/sdk/javascript/src/* ./dist/lib/ && npm run test
scripts.dist:docs: npm run validate && npm run build:docs asPath && rm -rf dist/docs && cp -R build/docs/markdown dist/docs
scripts.test:setup: rm -rf test/transpiled-suite && npx tsc --target es6 --moduleResolution node --outDir test/transpiled-suite/
scripts.build: npm run validate && npm run build:docs && npm run build:sdk
scripts.publish:word: mkdir -p dist/word/schemas && cd dist/docs && find . -iname "*.md" -type f -exec sh -c 'pandoc "${0}" -o "../word/${0%.md}.docx"' {} \;
